name: Bug report
about: Create a report to help us improve
title: "[BUG]"
labels: ''
assignees: Heroin-Bob

---

**Software version**
Include the version of Zpotify you are using. (If you are not on it try downloading the most recent version before submitting a bug report)

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**Reproduce**
Leave instructions on how to reproduce any issue you run in to. If it isn't something that can be reproduced it will be difficult to resolve.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.
